ing: 2 dates, pitted and chopped, or more taste
1 tablespoon cashew butter, or more to taste
n: Dreamy Cashew Butter Smoothie with Banana, Berry, Dates, and Flax
des: "My wife had this smoothie at a brunch spot in San Francisco and has been dreaming about it ever since. I dare say my own attempt turned out to be as good if not better. She calls it the Wake Up Without Coffee Smoothie! Yummy and healthy - try it out."
ins: Blend banana, almond milk, blueberries, dates, flax seeds, and cashew butter together in a blender on high speed until smooth.
